short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects Amazon UK to Amazon UK Smile so you never miss the chance to donate to your charity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you go to the default Amazon UK website or click on an Amazon UK link somewhere else, this extension will automatically redirect you to the Smile version of that page

This extension is open sourced under GNU General Public License v3.0
https://github.com/Vitaefinis/amazon-smile-redirector
